thread.title: Yandy.com Launches Sexy Fantasy Football Costume Line
thread.title_full: Yandy.com Launches Sexy Fantasy Football Costume Line

author: admin
title: Yandy.com Launches Sexy Fantasy Football Costume Line
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/10/2015 @ 11:12 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Yandy.com 
NEW YORK, Sept. 10, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- www.yandy.com -- Football season has officially arrived and leading costume and lingerie retailer Yandy.com is kicking off America's favorite past time in style. The brand has just introduced a new collection of football themed dresses and outfits that gives Fantasy Football an entirely new meaning. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150910/265478 
Yandy has a knack for knowing what's hot when it comes to women's apparel and these new football-themed outfits are no exception. "We like to look at a popular trends and give it a bit of a sexy twist," said Yandy CEO, Chad Horstman. "There's plenty of sports related apparel out there, but we wanted to offer an alternative look that would appeal to women," added Horstman. 
The expanded collection offers more than 30 crop top and short combinations, priced at $31.95, and comfort fit t-shirt dresses for $39.95. Yandy.com offers the costumes in a variety of colors including navy and red, green and yellow, blue and silver, to name a few, so customers can show off their home team loyalty. For those who would rather call the shots than take them this football season, Yandy also offers a variety of racy referee outfits. 
ABOUT YANDY Yandy.com is one of the world's largest online retailers of women's lingerie, costumes, swimwear, rave wear, and hosiery. Founded in 2005, Yandy.com carries more than 30,000 affordably priced products that are always in stock and available for same-day shipping. Designated as a Google Trusted Store, Yandy has a first-class dedicated customer service team and is committed to ensuring that every customer receives a safe and secure online shopping experience. Yandy takes pride in selling items for every shape and size. At Yandy, every customer can # BeSexy. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/yandycom-launches-sexy-fantasy-football-costume-line-300141057.html 
SOURCE Yandy.com
